Class HolidayBonus

  • java.lang.Object
    • HolidayBonus

  • public class HolidayBonus
extends java.lang.Object
    The purpose of this class is to provide methods to help calculate the Holiday bonuses the various stores, as well as the total holiday bonus among all stores I swear that I have not taken any code
    Author:
    Nicholas Baker

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HolidayBonus() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static double[] calculateHolidayBonus(double[][] sales, int highest, int lowest, int normal)
      Determines the total holiday bonus of each store using the given parameters and returns an array of doubles representing each store's total holiday bonus.
      static double calculateTotalHolidayBonus(double[][] sales, int highest, int lowest, int normal)
      Determines the total holiday bonus of each store using the given parameters and returns the total holiday bonus among all of the stores.

    • Method Detail

      • calculateHolidayBonus

        public static double[] calculateHolidayBonus(double[][] sales,
                                             int highest,
                                             int lowest,
                                             int normal)
        Determines the total holiday bonus of each store using the given parameters and returns an array of doubles representing each store's total holiday bonus.
        Parameters:
        sales - the array of sales statistics for each store
        highest - the holiday bonus for selling the most in a given category
        lowest - the holiday bonus for selling the least in a given category
        normal - the default holiday bonus
        Returns:
        an array of doubles representing the total holiday bonus of each store

      • calculateTotalHolidayBonus

        public static double calculateTotalHolidayBonus(double[][] sales,
                                                int highest,
                                                int lowest,
                                                int normal)
        Determines the total holiday bonus of each store using the given parameters and returns the total holiday bonus among all of the stores.
        Parameters:
        sales - the array of sales statistics for each store
        highest - the holiday bonus for selling the most in a given category
        lowest - the holiday bonus for selling the least in a given category
        normal - the default holiday bonus
        Returns:
        the total holiday bonus for all of the stores
